mapper.update: UPDATE user SET del_yn = 1 WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND role = "ROLE_STD"
mapper.select: select C.nm nm, MIN(A.rating) rating from mock_result A INNER JOIN subject B ON A.subject_id = B.subject_id INNER JOIN sbj_category C on B.category_id = c.category_id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId} and B.category_id in(2,5,4,8) group by C.nm

select C.nm, A.rating, concat(A.year,A.mon) date from mock_result A INNER JOIN subject B ON A.subject_id = B.subject_id INNER JOIN sbj_category C on B.category_id = c.category_id where A.user_id = #{userId} and B.category_id in(2,4,5,8) and A.year<=#{year} and A.mon<= #{mon} order by C.nm , A.mon desc limit 4

select concat(A.year,'0',A.mon) as date, C.nm as nm,A.rating as rating from mock_result A INNER JOIN subject B ON A.subject_id = B.subject_id INNER JOIN sbj_category C on B.category_id = c.category_id where A.user_id = #{userId} and B.category_id in(2,5,4,8)and A.year = #{year} and A.mon<=#{mon} ORDER BY A.year,A.mon,C.nm

select C.nm nm, min(A.rating) rating from aca_result A INNER JOIN subject B ON A.subject_id = B.subject_id INNER JOIN sbj_category C on B.category_id = c.category_id WHERE A.user_id = #{userId} and B.category_id in(1,3,7,6) and year<=#{year} group by C.nm

SELECT CONCAT(year,semester,mid_final) date, C.nm, A.rating FROM aca_result A INNER JOIN subject B ON A.subject_id = B.subject_id INNER JOIN sbj_category C on B.category_id = c.category_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND (YEAR, semester, mid_final) IN ( SELECT YEAR, semester, mid_final FROM aca_result WHERE result_id = ( SELECT MAX(result_id) FROM aca_result WHERE user_id = #{userId})) and B.category_id in(1,3,6,7) ;

select concat(year,semester,mid_final) as date, C.nm as nm,A.rating as rating from aca_result A INNER JOIN subject B ON A.subject_id = B.subject_id INNER JOIN sbj_category C on B.category_id = c.category_id where A.user_id = #{userId} and B.category_id in(1,3,6,7) and A.year = #{year} ORDER BY A.year,A.semester,A.mid_final
